column3: Sources = Own questionnaire. Household poll by CID-Gallup Latin America face-to-face poll (n ≥ 1000) + local legal professionals poll (n ≥ 8 + unknown number of anonymous contributers).

column1: World Justice Project Rule of Law Index

column3: World Justice Project Rule of Law Index
Nonprofit organization headquartered in Washington, United States, specializing in rule of law worldwide.
Combination of expert assessment and general public poll.
Panel of local respondents in each country, subject to centralized review, as well as general public poll
Annual since 2009 but for a rotating set of countries.  We use data only from 2011 and 2012 as earlier rounds not comparable.

ROLI rates countries on a variety of subcomponents relating to rule of law based on over 500 questions, some of which are answered by expert respondents annually, others answered in a general population survey once every three years.
